blogPost.excerpt: Startups on Product Hunt get $10,000 in credits on Freshworks products! Boost your startup journey with leading customer and employee engagement solutions from Freshworks including CRM, live chat, support, ITSM, and HRMS.
blogPost.body: Startups on Product Hunt get $10,000 in credits on Freshworks products! Boost your startup journey with leading customer and employee engagement solutions from Freshworks including CRM, live chat, support, ITSM, and HRMS.
blogPost.title: Freshworks for Startups - Get $10,000 credits on Freshworks Products for your startup
blogPost.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: 产品猎头上的初创企业可获得Freshworks产品的10000美元信用额度! 通过Freshworks领先的客户和员工参与解决方案，包括CRM、即时聊天、支持、ITSM和HRMS，提升您的创业之旅。
localize.tagline: 在Freshworks产品上获得10,000美元的信用额度，供您的创业公司使用。

localize.description: 產品獵頭上的初創企業可獲得Freshworks產品的10000美元信用額度! 通過Freshworks領先的客戶和員工參與解決方案，包括CRM、即時聊天、支持、ITSM和HRMS，提升您的創業之旅。
localize.tagline: 在Freshworks產品上獲得10,000美元的信用額度，供您的創業公司使用。

previous.excerpt: Sell access to a google sheet without sharing with the whole INTERNET. Easy to set up via Gumroad. Using gumroad ping, this sheet's script captures all sales and matches the sale with a sheet you assign in. Then gives viewer access to the buyer.
previous.title: OnlySheets - Sell access to any Google Sheet

localize.description: 出售访问google表，而不与整个INTERNET共享。通过Gumroad轻松设置。使用gumroad ping，这个表的脚本捕获所有的销售和匹配销售与你分配的表在。然后给浏览者访问买家。
localize.tagline: 出售任何Google Sheet的访问权限

localize.description: 出售訪問google表，而不與整個INTERNET共享。通過Gumroad輕鬆設置。使用gumroad ping，這個表的腳本捕獲所有的銷售和匹配銷售與你分配的表在。然後給瀏覽者訪問買家。
localize.tagline: 出售任何Google Sheet的訪問權限

next.excerpt: Zaraz boosts any website's performance with one line of code by loading your third-party tools on the cloud instead of the end-users’ browser. Improve your SEO and conversions in minutes.
next.title: Zaraz - A third-party manager that boosts website speed

localize.description: Zaraz通过在云端加载第三方工具，而不是在终端用户的浏览器中加载，只需一行代码就能提升任何网站的性能。在几分钟内提高您的SEO和转换率。
localize.tagline: 提升网站速度的第三方管理器

localize.description: Zaraz通過在雲端加載第三方工具，而不是在終端用戶的瀏覽器中加載，只需一行代碼就能提升任何網站的性能。在幾分鐘內提高您的SEO和轉換率。
localize.tagline: 提升網站速度的第三方管理器
